name: Sautéed Shrimp With Capers and Olives
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds peeled shrimp and 1/2 cup chopped tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Put 1/4 cup olive oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat.
Add 3 sliced garlic cloves, 2 tablespoons capers and 1/2 cup chopped pitted black olives, and cook until the garlic is golden.
Stir in 1 1/2 pounds peeled shrimp and 1/2 cup chopped tomatoes.
Cook, turning the shrimp once or twice, until they are pink, 5 to 10 minutes.
